cryptocurrencies.name: Acala
cryptocurrencies.description: A DeFi hub and stablecoin platform built on Polkadot that provides cross-chain liquidity, staking, and decentralized finance tools.

cryptocurrencies.name: Bitcoin
cryptocurrencies.description: The first decentralized cryptocurrency, serving as a digital store of value and a peer-to-peer payments network.

cryptocurrencies.name: BNB Beacon Chain
cryptocurrencies.description: The original Binance chain that powers fast transactions, token issuance, and the Binance ecosystem.

cryptocurrencies.name: Cardano
cryptocurrencies.description: A proof-of-stake blockchain platform focused on sustainability, scalability, and formal verification of smart contracts.

cryptocurrencies.name: Dogecoin
cryptocurrencies.description: A meme-inspired cryptocurrency created for fun that is known for its large community and low-fee, fast transactions.

cryptocurrencies.name: Solana
cryptocurrencies.description: A high-performance blockchain designed for decentralized applications and crypto projects, featuring fast throughput and low fees.

cryptocurrencies.name: Sui
cryptocurrencies.description: A Layer 1 blockchain optimized for scalability and low-latency transactions to support asset-centric decentralized applications.

cryptocurrencies.name: The Open Network
cryptocurrencies.description: A fast and scalable blockchain originally developed with Telegram, designed for micro-payments and decentralized apps.

cryptocurrencies.name: TRON
cryptocurrencies.description: A blockchain platform that focuses on decentralizing content and entertainment applications, enabling high-throughput transactions.

cryptocurrencies.name: Ethereum
cryptocurrencies.description: Open source platform to write and distribute decentralized applications.

cryptocurrencies.name: yearn.finance
cryptocurrencies.description: A decentralized finance (DeFi) aggregator that automatically moves funds between lending protocols to maximize yield for users.

cryptocurrencies.name: Bitcoin Dominance
cryptocurrencies.description: A metric representing Bitcoin's market capitalization as a percentage of the total cryptocurrency market cap, often traded as an index.

cryptocurrencies.name: Paxos Gold
cryptocurrencies.description: A gold-backed stablecoin where each token represents one fine troy ounce of London Good Delivery gold stored in Paxos vaults.

cryptocurrencies.name: Maker
cryptocurrencies.description: The governance token of MakerDAO, used to manage the DAI stablecoin system and vote on protocol changes.

cryptocurrencies.name: DeFi Index
cryptocurrencies.description: An index token that tracks the performance of a basket of decentralized finance tokens, providing diversified DeFi exposure.

cryptocurrencies.name: Bitcoin Cash
cryptocurrencies.description: A peer-to-peer electronic cash system created as a Bitcoin fork in 2017, focusing on faster transactions and lower fees.

cryptocurrencies.name: Bittensor
cryptocurrencies.description: A decentralized machine learning network that creates a peer-to-peer marketplace for artificial intelligence.

cryptocurrencies.name: Zcash
cryptocurrencies.description: A privacy-focused cryptocurrency that uses zero-knowledge proofs to enable shielded transactions with optional transparency.

cryptocurrencies.name: Monero
cryptocurrencies.description: A privacy-centric cryptocurrency that uses ring signatures and stealth addresses to provide untraceable transactions.

cryptocurrencies.name: Aave
cryptocurrencies.description: A decentralized lending protocol that allows users to lend and borrow cryptocurrencies without intermediaries.

cryptocurrencies.name: Litecoin
cryptocurrencies.description: A peer-to-peer cryptocurrency created as a 'lite' version of Bitcoin with faster block generation and a different hashing algorithm.

cryptocurrencies.name: Dash
cryptocurrencies.description: A cryptocurrency focused on fast, private transactions with features like InstantSend and PrivateSend.

cryptocurrencies.name: Giggle Academy
cryptocurrencies.description: A cryptocurrency token associated with educational or entertainment purposes.

cryptocurrencies.name: Quant
cryptocurrencies.description: The token powering Overledger, a blockchain operating system that enables interoperability between different blockchains.

cryptocurrencies.name: Hyperliquid
cryptocurrencies.description: A decentralized perpetual futures exchange token with high-performance trading capabilities.

cryptocurrencies.name: Compound
cryptocurrencies.description: The governance token of Compound Protocol, a decentralized lending platform on Ethereum.

cryptocurrencies.name: Tellor
cryptocurrencies.description: A decentralized oracle network that provides secure off-chain data to smart contracts on Ethereum.

cryptocurrencies.name: Bitcoin SV
cryptocurrencies.description: A Bitcoin Cash fork created in 2018 that aims to restore the original Bitcoin protocol with larger block sizes.

cryptocurrencies.name: Avalanche
cryptocurrencies.description: A layer-1 blockchain platform for decentralized applications and custom blockchain networks with high throughput and low latency.

cryptocurrencies.name: Horizen
cryptocurrencies.description: A privacy-focused blockchain platform with a sidechain architecture enabling decentralized applications.

cryptocurrencies.name: Chainlink
cryptocurrencies.description: A decentralized oracle network that connects smart contracts with real-world data, events, and payment systems.

cryptocurrencies.name: Ethereum Classic
cryptocurrencies.description: The original Ethereum blockchain that continued after the 2016 DAO hard fork, preserving immutability principles.

cryptocurrencies.name: Ethereum Name Service

cryptocurrencies.name: ApeSwap
cryptocurrencies.description: The native token of ApeSwap, a decentralized exchange and yield farming platform on multiple chains.

cryptocurrencies.name: Origin Protocol
cryptocurrencies.description: OG is a fan token that provides exclusive benefits and engagement opportunities for supporters in the esports and gaming community

cryptocurrencies.name: Kusama
cryptocurrencies.description: Kusama is a scalable network of specialized blockchains built using Substrate and nearly the same codebase as Polkadot. The network is an experimental development environment for teams who want to move fast and innovate on Kusama, or prepare for deployment on Polkadot.

cryptocurrencies.name: Prometeus
cryptocurrencies.description: Prometeus is a blockchain platform that provides data privacy and security solutions for businesses. The PROM token is used for governance, staking, and accessing services within the Prometeus ecosystem.

cryptocurrencies.name: Illuvium
cryptocurrencies.description: Illuvium is an open-world fantasy battle game built on the Ethereum blockchain. ILV is the native token used for in-game achievements, governance via the Illuvium DAO, and staking rewards.

cryptocurrencies.name: GMX
cryptocurrencies.description: GMX is a decentralized exchange for spot and perpetual trading with up to 100x leverage. It features low fees, transparent Chainlink pricing, and operates on Arbitrum, Avalanche, and Solana networks.

cryptocurrencies.name: MultiversX
cryptocurrencies.description: MultiversX (formerly Elrond) is a highly scalable blockchain platform using adaptive state sharding technology. EGLD is used for staking, governance, transactions, and smart contract execution with high throughput and low costs.

cryptocurrencies.name: Metis
cryptocurrencies.description: Metis is an Ethereum Layer 2 rollup platform focused on enabling easy creation of decentralized autonomous companies (DACs). METIS token is used for staking, governance, and transaction fees within the ecosystem.

cryptocurrencies.name: Euler
cryptocurrencies.description: Euler is a decentralized lending protocol on Ethereum that enables permissionless lending and borrowing. EUL is the governance token that allows holders to vote on protocol parameters and upgrades.

cryptocurrencies.name: Injective
cryptocurrencies.description: Injective is a decentralized exchange protocol offering cross-chain spot and derivatives trading. INJ token is used for governance, staking, collateral backing, and network security.

cryptocurrencies.name: Official Trump
cryptocurrencies.description: Official Trump is a meme cryptocurrency launched in January 2025 featuring imagery of Donald Trump. It is a speculative digital asset not intended as an investment or political campaign tool.

cryptocurrencies.name: DeXe
cryptocurrencies.description: DeXe is a decentralized social trading platform where users can copy trading strategies from successful traders. DEXE token is used for governance and to access premium platform features.

cryptocurrencies.name: Bounce
cryptocurrencies.description: Bounce is a decentralized auction protocol for token sales and NFT auctions. AUCTION token is used for governance, staking, and accessing premium auction features on the platform.

cryptocurrencies.name: River
cryptocurrencies.description: River is a DeFi protocol focused on liquidity provision and yield farming opportunities. The RIVER token is used for governance and earning rewards within the ecosystem.

cryptocurrencies.name: Enzyme
cryptocurrencies.description: Enzyme (formerly Melon Protocol) is a decentralized asset management platform on Ethereum. MLN is used for governance and to pay fees for creating and managing investment funds on the platform.

cryptocurrencies.name: Evaa Protocol
cryptocurrencies.description: Evaa Protocol is a decentralized lending and borrowing platform. EVAA token powers the protocol's governance and provides holders with access to platform features and rewards.

cryptocurrencies.name: Uniswap
cryptocurrencies.description: Uniswap is a leading decentralized exchange protocol for trading ERC-20 tokens. UNI is the governance token allowing holders to vote on protocol decisions and future upgrades.

cryptocurrencies.name: Livepeer
cryptocurrencies.description: Livepeer is a decentralized video streaming network protocol built on Ethereum. LPT is used for staking, network security, and incentivizing video transcoding work on the platform.

cryptocurrencies.name: Neo
cryptocurrencies.description: Neo is a blockchain platform designed for building decentralized applications and smart contracts. NEO token is used for governance rights and generating GAS tokens for network operations.

cryptocurrencies.name: SSV Network
cryptocurrencies.description: SSV Network is a decentralized staking infrastructure using distributed validator technology. SSV token is used for payments to node operators and governance of the network protocol.

cryptocurrencies.name: Ordinals
cryptocurrencies.description: ORDI is the first BRC-20 token on the Bitcoin network, representing inscriptions on satoshis. It enables fungible tokens to be created directly on the Bitcoin blockchain.

cryptocurrencies.name: Venus
cryptocurrencies.description: Venus is a DeFi lending protocol on BNB Chain enabling borrowing, lending, and minting of synthetic stablecoins. XVS is the governance token used for protocol decisions and rewards.

cryptocurrencies.name: Omni Network
cryptocurrencies.description: Omni Network is a Layer 1 blockchain connecting Ethereum rollups to eliminate liquidity fragmentation. OMNI is used for gas fees, cross-rollup communications, and network staking.

cryptocurrencies.name: Story Protocol
cryptocurrencies.description: Story Protocol is a blockchain network for programmable IP (intellectual property) management. IP token powers the ecosystem enabling creators to license, remix, and monetize their creative works.

cryptocurrencies.name: Arweave
cryptocurrencies.description: Arweave is a decentralized storage network providing permanent data storage with a one-time fee. AR token is used to pay for data storage and reward miners who provide storage capacity.

cryptocurrencies.name: Fluid
cryptocurrencies.description: Fluid is a DeFi lending protocol offering optimized capital efficiency. FLUID token is used for governance, rewards distribution, and accessing protocol features.

cryptocurrencies.name: Internet Computer
cryptocurrencies.description: Internet Computer is a blockchain that extends internet functionality allowing developers to build websites, enterprise systems, and DeFi services. ICP is used for governance, staking, and powering computation.

cryptocurrencies.name: Moonriver
cryptocurrencies.description: Moonriver is a companion network to Moonbeam providing Ethereum-compatible smart contract functionality on Kusama. MOVR is used for transaction fees, governance, and collator staking.

cryptocurrencies.name: Aptos
cryptocurrencies.description: Aptos is a Layer 1 blockchain focused on safety, scalability, and upgradeability using the Move programming language. APT is used for transaction fees, staking, and governance.

cryptocurrencies.name: Rocket Pool
cryptocurrencies.description: Rocket Pool is a decentralized Ethereum staking protocol allowing anyone to stake ETH with lower minimums. RPL is used as collateral for node operators and governance participation.

cryptocurrencies.name: Pendle
cryptocurrencies.description: Pendle is a DeFi protocol enabling tokenization and trading of future yield. PENDLE token is used for governance, staking, and incentivizing liquidity provision on the platform.

cryptocurrencies.name: Cosmos
cryptocurrencies.description: Cosmos is a network of interconnected blockchains designed to enable interoperability between different chains. ATOM is used for staking to secure the network, governance voting, and transaction fees.

cryptocurrencies.name: Vana

cryptocurrencies.name: Polkadot

cryptocurrencies.name: Gas
